page.title: 08A Year of School Activities
page.content: In 1985 pupils from Sugar Hill School visited Darlington Civic Theatre, Middleton-in-Teesdale,Appleby Castle, Witton Park nature trail,Auckland Palace,Brafferton Farm and Bardonnecia Italy,skiing.Visits to the school have been made by three theatre companies,a working actor,a bee-keeper,a bird sanctuary officer,Santa Claus,firemen with their engine,policemen,Merlin a wizard,Derek Foster M.P,a photographer groups of musicians and local play scheme leaders.Other activities have included golf lessons,dry skiing, netball and football matches swimming galas,school film club,tree-planting by pupils,Easter Egg competition, Harvest Festival,Christmas Parties, sponsored events for fund-raising and Sports Day.New learning programmes have been introduced,a school uniform adopted and many other events occurred
